item.description:
Let's get back into the Ethnic Dining events...
On Wednesday, October 1, join us at Senor Pancho's Tex-Mex restaurant in Cromwell.

Restaurant is located right off of Rte 9, Exit 19 in Cromwell. Head toward K-Mart and StopNShop... turn left onto Rte 3, then left into the Crossroads Plaza. Senor Panchos is straight ahead in the strip mall.

Menu includes Very good margaritas and sangria... house specials... and something mild for those of tender stomach.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll make a reservation for the 'Tall Club'
item.name: Ethnic Dining - We're going TEX-MEX! ** NOTE: change in location **
